source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Screenwriting: What makes a good story?
items.headline: How to generate ideas and tell your story
objectives_summary: The first question you need to ask before you write anything.
The difference between good and bad writing.
What some industry experts have to say about Story.

items.title: Creativity Booster
items.headline: Discover and Unleash Your Creativity
objectives_summary: Learn how to unleash your creative powers, even if you don't think you have any
Identify your preferred creative environment.
Try 6 methods for increasing your creativity in your work.

items.title: The Ultimate Book Writing Class
items.headline: Everything You Need to Know from A-Z
objectives_summary: Step by step guide to transform an idea into a completed book (non-fiction)
Step by step guide to preparing your  final draft to be ready for being published
Step by step guide to self publishing your book

items.title: The Ultimate Acrylic Painting - Practise and Theory
items.headline: I love painting and it's my all life! You will love it as well - Learn with me how to become the great artist!
objectives_summary: On this course you will learn how to paint with acrylic paint. You will achive the knowledge about the basics and you will create 4 paintings.

items.title: How You Can Believe in Yourself, Write & Complete Your Novel

visible_instructors.job_title: Spoken Word Strategist, Exec. Coach, International Speaker
visible_instructors.name: Tom
visible_instructors.title: Tom Marcoux

items.headline: Overcome Fear, Procrastination and Perfectionism -- Enjoy Feelings of Accomplishment and Reach Your Readers
objectives_summary: Write your novel today and feel great as you do it
Use techniques to quickly get started with each writing session
Overcome fear

items.title: Get Creative Today - How To Think And Grow Great Ideas Fast!

visible_instructors.job_title: Giving YOU Business Insight, Wisdom, And Know-How!
visible_instructors.name: MMBO
visible_instructors.title: MMBO Online

items.headline: Easily Generate New Concepts, Ideas and Aha Moments - Even If You Are NOT Creative…
objectives_summary: Generate game-changing ideas fast.
Recognize a great idea when you see one.
Unleash the true power of your thoughts and ideas.

items.title: Kids Drawing and Basic Art - Dinosaurs Drawing and Coloring
items.headline: Children learn to create Dinosaur art project through step by step basic drawing, coloring and designing background!
objectives_summary: Drawing 5 types of Dinosaurs from basics
Creative Oil pastel coloring method
Designing a simple landscape scene

items.title: Writing Young Adult Novels | A Novelist's Guide
items.headline: A Full Breakdown on Writing Novels for Young Adults
objectives_summary: You will understand the young adult market
You will learn how to plan a novel
You will learn how to write a lengthy novel to fit the young adult market

items.title: The 10 Principles for Unstoppable Creativity
items.headline: Discover how to hack your creative drive, overcome creative blocks and develop an empowering approach to creativity.
objectives_summary: How to overcome resistance to creativity, from negative self-talk to unhelpful beliefs.
How to embrace the fear of failure, rejection and critique.
How to unlearn reductive thinking.

items.title: Learn how to paint miniature figure Part I (Beginner)
items.headline: Preparation of a figure and the basic theoretical concepts
objectives_summary: How to use tools
Cleaning imperfection of the figure
Priming with airbrush

items.title: Painting Dot Mandalas Tutorial (Course).
items.headline: This course will make you to start drawing your mandala. Get inspired and find your creative side with your inner being!
objectives_summary: Basic steps in drawing the Mandalas, sketching the outlines, learning dotting technique, adding extra dots for decoration

items.title: THE STORY CODE: Writing Secrets Revealed (Ideas Generator)
items.headline: How to generate and develop awesome ideas, right now!
objectives_summary: Exactly what an idea really is
How to create ‘new’ ideas
The crucial Story Codes hiding in plain sight

items.title: How to Make a Zine
items.headline: Art, Activism, and Finding Your Voice
objectives_summary: •	What zines are, who makes zines, why artists and writers make zines
•	How to craft an interesting, visually appealing zine
•	How to print and distribute your zine

items.title: The Power of your Imagination
items.headline: Empower your imagination and creative thinking for a positive change in your life
objectives_summary: Students will learn to empower their imagination
How to boost your creativity
Learn the process of creative thinking

items.title: How to Write Fantasy Fiction

visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.
visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf

items.headline: Techniques, method, structure and essential knowledge for writing a modern fantasy novel
objectives_summary: How to define the fantasy genre and decide if you are a fantasy author
How to approach the creation of a fantasy world.
How to choose and use archetypal fantasy characters

items.title: How to Write Your Life Story
items.headline: Find Your Voice as You Uncover, Discover, Recover, and Rejoice!
objectives_summary: Realise how awesome you are, and how amazing your life story is.
Stretch your imagination and use hearsay as you chronicle your ancestors’ day-to-day life, immigration, and heroic war stories.
Find your child’s voice and write about all aspects of your childhood, and do the same for your teenage years.
